alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Dawson; Fannin; Forsyth; Gilmer; Lumpkin; North Fulton; Pickens (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 6:27PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Cherokee, northwestern Forsyth, southwestern Lumpkin, southern Gilmer, Dawson, north central Fulton, Pickens and southeastern Fannin Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 626 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Ball Ground, or 9 miles northeast of Canton, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph, frequent lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Canton, Jasper, Roswell, Milton, Woodstock, Holly Springs, Ball Ground, Nelson, Waleska, Talking Rock, Free Home, Buffington, Amicalola Falls State Park, Hickory Flat, Sequoyah Lake, Hightower, Juno, Fausett Lake, Len Foote Hike Inn and Cartecay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Cherokee; Dawson; Fannin; Forsyth; Gilmer; Lumpkin; North Fulton; Pickens
